Reviews.Title: Inaccurate Picture, these are not audio/video baluns, they are only video baluns
Reviews.Author: Twain
Reviews.Content: Picture clearly shows audio/video baluns, but alas, they are not. These baluns only have a power connector and a coax connector and I REPEAT THEY HAVE NO CONNECTION  FOR AUDIO. THESE ARE VIDEO BALUNS ONLY. Amazon please change the picture!

Reviews.Title: Very nice in general
Reviews.Author: C. Arnold "Multimedia shtick"
Reviews.Content: These are very nice but the design for the camera end will not slip through a hole smaller than 1". Even then with everything connected getting it through a 1" hole is very difficult making mounting a bit of a challenge in some hard ceilings/eves where crawling can be difficult. The small bullet cams I was installing could only have about a 3/4" hole before their would be nothing to mount too so I had to crawl to connect rather than connect and mount.This also worked to connect a Samsung analog CCTV PoE camera [built in data wire with RJ45 end] to my swann d-1 DVR and have a separate power supply for it and run the swann cams on a Samsung PoE DVR. The wiring in the units should work for any EIA/TIA 568B configured CCTV PoE device [power on the blue pairs].

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I used these outdoors and they are great.  Simple and easy to connect CCTV cameras with UTP cable.  good product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our Q-See system
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I used these balun transceivers so that I could use the more "future-proof" cat-5 cabling for my cameras (for running HD IP cameras when I upgrade next time), rather than the coax cable that the Q-See system I was installing came with.  These work perfectly.  Picture quality is the great, and the being able to run both video and power over one cat-5 cable is very convenient.

Reviews.Title: Work Perfectly
Reviews.Author: Diver
Reviews.Content: Not sure these are available any more however they worked perfectly.  Couldng find them so ordered the ones with audio and they are terrible!!
